root: ^Alright, there's only one more peripheral we will cover, which is the USB stick
^This special stick acts as portable storage. You can think of it like a tiny Solid-State Drive!
^As the name suggests, these are also plugged into a USB slot. Once plugged in, your computer can both read and write files to it just like your regular storage!
^However, you can easily unplug the USB and take it with you anywhere, and the files will stay on it. You can even plug it into another computer and access the files on there too. It's really handy!
^Let's go ahead and plug it in now.
